channel.title: Deployment on Matt Stine
channel.description: Recent content in Deployment on Matt Stine

item.title: deploying grails with groovy
item.description: Interesting title, eh? Maybe this one will make it through Glen’s filter at GroovyBlogs.org. On to the meat. I’ve been steadily working on a couple of Grails applications, one being the website for the Memphis JUG, and another being the e-commerce site for my wife’s soon to be launched designer stationery business. Just like your average Grails developer, I’ve been happily coding away at 127.0.0.1 using the good old development Jetty+MySQL stack.
